title: Hi everyone..this is me Danielle and this is my almost 8 wk photo update. I decided to put the same ...

attachments.displayName:
Hi everyone..this is me Danielle and this is my almost 8 wk photo update. I decided to put the same clothes on so you could see a difference in how my clothes fit me now. I am actually starting to get a shape to my body again, I have a waist and it is really starting to show in my back ( may not be very noticable in the pic) I lose slower than a lot of people because of my thyroid, but I know it is working because I could not lose any amount of weight in the last few years. I am going to try and be a little more conscious of what I eat from now on because once I hit my goal weight I need to make the changes necessary in my life so I can maintain what Skinny Fiber is helping me accomplish! My first pic I didn't even want my son to get a shot of my face in the pic because I was embarrassed of my appearance and did not want my friends to see my face or recognize me. I am feeling a lot better about posting it now because I am proud of what I have been able to accomplish! If you are sitting on the fence wondering and debating does it really work, well I think my pic's speak for themselves!

Order yours and get a head start before the holidays!
www.Malara.eatlessfeelfull.com

object.content:
Hi everyone..this is me Danielle and this is my almost 8 wk photo update. I decided to put the same clothes on so you could see a difference in how my clothes fit me now. I am actually starting to get a shape to my body again, I have a waist and it is really starting to show in my back ( may not be very noticable in the pic) I lose slower than a lot of people because of my thyroid, but I know it is working because I could not lose any amount of weight in the last few years. I am going to try and be a little more conscious of what I eat from now on because once I hit my goal weight I need to make the changes necessary in my life so I can maintain what Skinny Fiber is helping me accomplish! My first pic I didn't even want my son to get a shot of my face in the pic because I was embarrassed of my appearance and did not want my friends to see my face or recognize me. I am feeling a lot better about posting it now because I am proud of what I have been able to accomplish! If you are sitting on the fence wondering and debating does it really work, well I think my pic's speak for themselves!

Order yours and get a head start before the holidays!
